Name: West of House
Descripton: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

Name: Rocky Trail
Descripton: You are on a rock-strewn trail.

Name: South of House
Descripton: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Name: Canyon View
Descripton: You are at the top of the Great Canyon on its south wall.

Name: Forest
Descripton: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

Name: Behind House
Descripton: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

Name: Dense Woods
Descripton: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.
